LanguageData.EdB.ModOrder.NoModWarning:
You must have at least one mod active. If you only have one mod active, it must be the Core mod or a mod that is meant to replace the Core mod.
If you choose to continue, the Core mod will be activated for you.
LanguageData.EdB.ModOrder.CoreModOrderWarning:
Usually, the Core mod should be first in the list of active mods so that subsequent mods can override its base definitions.
Are you sure that you want to move the Core mod from the first position?
